Q7: Do you have any additional comment(s) or experience(s) related to the experiment you would like to share?

With no audio assist, I preferred the scrolling, but with audio I preferred the RVSP. This is because the scroll rate of the RVSP was not quite synced to my reading speed and cadence when the audio was playing.
